name: Patagonia Baggies 5" Shorts - Men's
description:
They're classics for a reason. At home in hot climates and on (or in) the water, Baggies feel light and airy. Loose and comfortable, they're up for amphibious adventures of all kinds. A DWR finish helps them shed water, grime and that rogue drip of taco sauce.DWR finish helps them dry quickly and shrugs off dirt.Pockets carry a few key items.Elastic waist with internal drawstring.Quick dry mesh liner.Relaxed fit.

        Sustainability
